channel.title: Parallels Desktop on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Parallels Desktop on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Parallels Desktop 26 offers a lot to enterprise users, a little to consumers
item.description: There are no major new consumer features. Enterprises get a few things though.

item.title: Parallels Desktop 26 Adds Support for macOS Tahoe and Windows 11 2025 Update
item.description: Parallels Desktop 26 for Mac has just been released, bringing new features and performance enhancements to the virtualization software, including full support for Apple’s forthcoming macOS Tahoe opera

item.title: Parallels Desktop 26 Adds Support for macOS Tahoe and Windows 11 2025 Update
item.description: Parallels Desktop 26 for Mac has just been released, bringing new features and performance enhancements to the virtualization software, including full support for Apple’s forthcoming macOS Tahoe opera
